templates.title: 30 Days of Meditation
templates.purpose: Reduce stress and improve focus through daily mindfulness practice
templates.successCriteria: Meditate for at least 10 minutes each morning before checking phone
templates.description: Start each morning with a 10-minute meditation session. Use a guided app or simply focus on your breath.

templates.title: 7-Day Digital Detox
templates.purpose: Reclaim time and attention from social media
templates.successCriteria: No social media apps for 7 consecutive days
templates.description: Delete social apps from your phone. Notice how you spend your time differently.

templates.title: Read 30 Minutes Daily
templates.purpose: Build a consistent reading habit to learn and relax
templates.successCriteria: Read for 30 minutes before bed instead of screens
templates.description: Replace evening screen time with book time. Keep a book on your nightstand.

templates.title: 21-Day Gratitude Journal
templates.purpose: Shift perspective toward positivity and appreciation
templates.successCriteria: Write 3 things you're grateful for each night
templates.description: End each day by writing what went well. Be specific and personal.

templates.title: Cold Shower Challenge
templates.purpose: Build mental resilience and boost energy
templates.successCriteria: End every shower with 30 seconds of cold water
templates.description: Gradually increase cold exposure. Start with 15 seconds and work up.

templates.title: No Complaints Week
templates.purpose: Develop awareness of negative speech patterns
templates.successCriteria: Go a full day without complaining, criticizing, or gossiping
templates.description: Wear a rubber band on your wrist. Snap it when you catch yourself complaining.

templates.title: 30-Minute Daily Walk
templates.purpose: Improve physical health and clear your mind
templates.successCriteria: Walk for 30 minutes without phone distractions
templates.description: Leave your phone at home or in your pocket. Just walk and observe.

templates.title: Morning Pages
templates.purpose: Unlock creativity and process thoughts through writing
templates.successCriteria: Write 3 pages of stream-of-consciousness every morning
templates.description: Write immediately upon waking, before coffee. Don't censor yourself.

templates.title: Sugar-Free Fortnight
templates.purpose: Reset taste buds and reduce sugar dependency
templates.successCriteria: Avoid all added sugars for 14 days
templates.description: Read labels carefully. Focus on whole foods.

templates.title: Learn Something New
templates.purpose: Develop a new skill through consistent daily practice
templates.description: Choose a skill: language, instrument, coding, etc. Use the same time slot daily.

templates.title: Weekly Review Habit
templates.successCriteria: Complete a 30-minute weekly review every Sunday
templates.description: Review wins, lessons, and set intentions for the coming week.

templates.title: Reach Out Daily
templates.successCriteria: Send one meaningful message to a friend or family member each day
templates.description: Not just 'hey' - share something specific or ask a real question.
